page.title: 03Our School
page.content: Cheriton Bishop has one school. It is a primary school which has 44 children and 2 teachers. When we are 11 years we have to go to Queen Elizabeth Comprehensive School at Crediton. We have a big football field, a netball court, 2 swimming pools including one for beginners. My favourite lessons are mathematics and art. At Christmas we do pantomimes and have parties. Each Summer we go for a weeks's camp at Chagford. It is excellent fun. 12 children have school dinners. They are cooked in Exeter and brought in each day by van. Most children prefer packed lunches. The school day begins at 9 am with one hour for dinnertime at 12 noon and finishes at 3.30 pm. We play games with other schools. We are doing a project about Norman England. Excerpts from Childrens' work
